variable.name: EASTERNCANCERONCOLOGYGROUP
variable.description: The ECOG functional performance status of the subject

variable.name: KARNOFSKYPERFORMANCESCORE
variable.description: Score from the Karnofsky Performance status scale

variable.name: PERFORMANCESTATUSSCALETIMING
variable.description: Timepoint in reference to a patient's therapy in which a performance status assessment is conducted

variable.name: PROGRESSIONDETERMINEDBY
variable.description: Name of the procedure or testing method used to diagnose tumor recurrence

variable.name: BCREXAMINATIONBARCODE
variable.description: Unique identifier for a subject examination
